sentences.en: An Ordnance Survey grid reference gives the position of a place to within 100 metres.
sentences.cn: 全国地形测量局的地图坐标标示某地的位置精确到100米以內.

sentences.en: Draw the plan on a grid.
In this application, the carrier is used to encapsulate the grid.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下, 要用载体把格栅密封起来.

sentences.en: In this manner energy is transferred from the field to the grid.
sentences.cn: 能量就这样由电场传给线栅.

sentences.en: It is fed into the grid at this voltage.
sentences.cn: 它是以这种电压馈入电力网.

sentences.en: Its streets were laid out in a grid pattern.
sentences.cn: 那里的街道是棋盘式的布局。

sentences.en: Many canals were built along map grid lines.
sentences.cn: 很多运河是按照地图上的坐标线开凿的。

sentences.en: Modern gauges consist of metal foil in the form of a grid.
sentences.cn: 现代应变仪则由网格形式的金属片组成.
纽约棋盘式的街道布局

sentences.en: Power can be fed from wind generators into the electricity grid system.
sentences.cn: 电力可以从风力发电机流入输电网.

sentences.en: Sheet edges are normally either graduate lines or grid lines.
sentences.cn: 页面图廓,通常不是经纬网线,就是直角坐标网线.

sentences.en: The element employs a bifilar wound wire grid on an insulating substrate.
sentences.cn: 元件系用双股绕线网缠绕在一块绝缘基板上.

sentences.en: The television screens of the next century will be linked up to an emerging world telecommunications grid.
sentences.cn: 下个世纪的电视屏幕将会接入到正在形成的全球电信网络中。

sentences.en: This electricity is then fed into the electricity grid system.
sentences.cn: 然后,这一电流被输入电网系统.

sentences.en: Wire gages were produced with both flat - grid and bobbin - type constructions.
sentences.cn: 制造金属丝应变片可采取平格栅型和线管型两种结构.

sentences.en: Wires criss-cross between the tops of the poles, forming a grid.
sentences.cn: 电线杆顶端的电线相互交错，形成电线网。

words.tran_cn: [电子]网格；[数]格子，栅格；输电网

trans.tran_cn: 格子，非实质的，地图上的坐标方格，（输电线路、天然气管道等的）系统网络
trans.tran_en: the network of electricity supply wires that connects  power stations  and provides electricity to buildings in an area
